entry.content: Image: Ludeon Studios Anomaly changes up the game‚Äôs rhythm ‚Äî and I love it In RimWorld, you play as crash-landed survivors who have to eke out a new existence on a hostile planet, surviving and perhaps thriving between raider attacks, AI uprisings, and swarms of hostile insects. If you only have the spare scratch to pick up one RimWorld expansion, Anomaly is by far your best choice. RimWorld...
